title: PassDex
description: An app to add any barcode/QR Code to your Apple Wallet, leveraging the latest metadata features introduced in iOS 18.

title: EngineeringMode
description: Contributed MetricKit support to the iOS dev debugging tool that shows Permissions, Push Notifications, UserDefaults and other metrics. Implemented SwiftData persistence for 7-day metric history and visualized performance data using Swift Charts.

title: LlamaStack iOS
description: An iMessage-style chatbot application providing native messaging experience with on-device AI capabilities.

title: Programming Language Benchmarks
description: Contributed Swift benchmarks to a comprehensive programming language performance comparison repository, helping developers understand Swift's performance characteristics across various computational tasks.

title: Prickly Pear Health
description: Building the next generation of healthcare tools for improving the mental health of perimenopausal women using MVVM+Coordinator pattern, implementing RAG and on-device inference, achieving 98% crash-free rate and processing 10,000+ daily journals with wearable integrations.

title: vishrutjha.com | My Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website featuring dynamic content loading and smooth animations.

title: Simple Node Editor
description: A native node editor application supporting document types and JSON export capabilities.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock
description: A modern take on the classic Rock Paper Scissors game with a Big Bang Theory twist, featuring smooth animations and haptic feedback.

title: FIFAWC22
description: An app to track 2022 FIFA World Cup matches, scores, standings, and key statistics in real-time.

title: AppliFly
description: An open-source collaboration with Kshitij Dhyani to automate the application process for on-campus jobs at ASU.

title: NYX by PNYX.xyz
description: A gamified platform for unreleased music A/B testing inspired by 'The Voice' show's blind auditions. Implemented high-performance audio streaming with AVFoundation and custom caching. Integrated dual payment systems with Apple Pay and Web3 (Coinbase API, MetaMask SDK) for blockchain transactions. Built a seamless UX for music discovery and perks redemption while maintaining user anonymity.

title: Ziply Fiber
description: A comprehensive app for managing Ziply Fiber accounts, connections, and payments, featuring real-time network monitoring.

title: Hot Cell and Hot Zone analysis of Spatial Data
description: An academic project for Data Processing at Scale course to perform Hotzone and Hotcell analysis on spatial data from a NYC taxicab company.

title: FDAlytics
description: A tool to track FDA inspections and inform pharmaceutical companies' SOPs, featuring automated data processing and analytics.

title: LiveSHIELD
description: A real-time antivirus software utilizing Nessus, NMap, and NVD for vulnerability scanning across networks, with ELK stack for analytics and socket.io for real-time alerts.
